entry.title: Mug Root Beer - Original Soda - 12 x 355 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mugs Root Beer
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 7.49

Mug Root Beer - Original Soda - 12 x 355 ml

 

From enjoying a frosty glass at a family meal, to hanging with friends, to making root beer floats, Mug Root Beer's extra-creamy vanilla flavor has been creating memories for over 65 years. Just one sip of Mug Root Beer's tried and true goodness will surely take you back to when things were carefree and fun; and it's still the perfect drink for the whole family to enjoy together!

  • Mug Root Beer is a delicious drink for all ages
  • Classic root beer taste with a unique aroma
  • Perfect complement to a dessert or a meal
  • Caffeine free
  • Size: 355 ml
  • Includes 12 cans per pack

entry.title: Crush - Orange Soda - 12 x 355 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crush
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 7.49

Crush -  Orange Soda - 12 x 355 ml

Crush offers an exciting rush of flavor and fun in every sip. As the original orange soda, Crush has a long history of delighting consumers with a wide range of crowd-pleasing fruity flavors. Available in Orange, Grape, Strawberry, Pineapple, Watermelon, Peach, and Diet Orange, Crush has enough variety for the whole family to enjoy.

Orange Crush* is like drinking a party, wrapped in a brilliant burst of orange flavour! This 12-pack of 355 mL cans is a convenient format to treat your taste buds-and your friends-to a tidal wave of taste.
• 12 x 355 mL cans
• Intense burst of orange flavour
• The first in a family of fun flavours

entry.title: San Pellegrino - Pompelmo GrapeFruit Sparkling Beverage - 6 x 330 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: San Pellegrino
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 6.99

San Pellegrino - Pompelmo GrapeFruit Sparkling Beverage - 6 x 330 ml

Sparkling grapefruit beverage with 16% grapefruit juice from concentrate.

Water, Sugars (sugar, concentrated grapefruit juice, grapefruit purée), Carbon dioxide, Citric acid, Natural flavour.

Now available in new look packaging, same authentic taste!

 Transform any ordinary moment with our favourite sparkling grapefruit drink, Sanpellegrino Pompelmo.

Amazingly zesty and thirst-quenching, the gorgeous sun-ripened grapefruit from the citrus groves in the Mediterranean gives Sanpellegrino Pompelmo its unique characteristics.

An opaque yellow in colour with just the right amount of carbonation, the aroma of juicy grapefruit fills the nose.

A sip starts sweet but ends bittersweet, with a lingering taste of juicy squeezed grapefruit that dances across your tongue.

entry.title: San Pellegrino - Melograno & Arancia Sparkling Beverage - 6 x 330 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: San Pellegrino
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 6.99

San Pellegrino - Pomegranate & Orange Sparkling Beverage - 6 x 330 ml

Sparkling pomegranate & orange beverage with 11% orange and 5% pomegranate juices from concentrate.

Water, Sugars (sugar, concentrated orange juice, concentrated pomegranate juice, orange purée), Carbon dioxide, Anthocyanin, Natural flavour, Citric acid.

Now available in new look packaging, same authentic taste!

 The glistening rosey-red and light effervescence of Sanpellegrino Melograno & Arancia is lust at first sight.

Made with the delicious juices of orange and pomegranate, Melograno & Arancia blooms with a bouquet of gently squeezed orange juice tainted with the exciting scent of glamorous pomegranate.

Notes of sun-ripened oranges blend expertly with elegant pomegranate creating a fresh tartness that is just on the right side of sweet.

entry.title: San Pellegrino - Limonata Lemon Sparkling Beverage - 6 x 330 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: San Pellegrino
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 6.99

San Pellegrino - Limonata Lemon Sparkling Beverage - 6 x 330 ml

Sparkling lemon beverage with 16% lemon juice from concentrate.

Water, Sugar, Lemon juice, Concentrated lemon juice, Carbon dioxide, Natural flavour, Pectin.

Now available in new look packaging, same authentic taste!

 Be transported to the lemon groves of Italy with Sanpellegrino Limonata.

With 16% of juices of ripe lemons from southern Italy, Sanpellegrino Limonata is in a league of its own.

With its intense bouquet of the tasty zest and squeezed juice of lemons, Limonata has a soothing opal white colour that is punctuated with clean, crisp bubbles.

Smooth on the palate, Sanpellegrino Limonata is a delicately balanced drink with fresh and tart notes that linger in the mouth, with the perfect sweet touch to end.

entry.title: San Pellegrino - Clementina Sparkling Beverage - 6 x 330 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: San Pellegrino
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 6.99

San Pellegrino - Clementine Carbonated Beverage - 6 x 330 ml

Sparkling clementine beverage with 9% mandarine, 5% orange and 2% clementine juices from concentrate.

Water, Sugars (sugar, concentrated mandarin juice, concentrated orange juice, concentrated clementine juice, orange purée), Carbon dioxide, Natural flavour, Citric acid, Abthocyanin.

Now available in new look packaging, same authentic taste!

 

The delicate and unforgettable taste of juicy fruits transports you to Southern Italy scents, a scenic landscape where the sun always shines.

Sanpellegrino Clementina opens with a lovely bouquet of ripe clementine and orange on the nose which forms the most refreshing and rich taste in the mouth accentuated by the delightful flavor of clementine.

entry.title: San Pellegrino - Aranciata Rossa Sparkling Beverage - 6 x 330 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: San Pellegrino
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 6.99

San Pellegrino - Blood Orange Sparkling Beverage - 24 x 330 ml

Sparkling blood orange and orange beverage with 17% orange and 3% blood orange juices from concentrate.

Water, Sugars (sugar, concentrated orange juice, concentrated blood orange juice, orange purée), Carbon dioxide, Natural flavour, Abthocyanin, Citric acid, Pectin, Paprika.

Sanpellegrino Aranciata Rossa is made from oranges and blood oranges from Italy and get their unique colour and taste from the conditions of the land in which they are grown.

Characterised by its red-orange colour, Aranciata Rossa has a delicate scent that fills your nose with notes of ripe oranges.

Lightly carbonated for that refreshing full-mouth sensation, it starts off on a sweet note and ends with the invigorating taste of juicy squeezed orange.

entry.title: San Pellegrino - Aranciata Orange Sparkling Beverage - 6 x 330 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: San Pellegrino
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 6.99

San Pellegrino - Aranciata Orange Sparkling Beverage - 24 x 330 ml

Sparkling orange beverage with 20% orange juice from concentrate.

Water, Sugars (sugar, concentrated orange juice, orange purée), Carbon Dioxide, Citric acid, Pectin, Natural flavour.

Now available in new look packaging, same authentic taste!

 Sanpellegrino Aranciata is Italy’s famous aranciata, with a history dating back to 1932. 

The quality of the ingredients gives the iconic Aranciata its lively orange colour, with fine bubbles that are pleasantly visible to the eye.

 Delicate on the nose with notes of juicy squeezed orange, Sanpellegrino Aranciata has a medium sweetness that is balanced with subtle bitter notes of natural orange. This carries through to a caramelised orange finish, creating a truly unique taste that dances in the mouth.

entry.title: Pakola - Green Cream Soda - 24 x 250 ML
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pakola
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 21.99

Pakola Green Cream Soda - 24 x 250 ML

Pakola is one of the most popular brands in Pakistan. The brand was created on 14th August, 1950. As per our slogan, “DIL BOLA …. Pakola”, we believe that Pakola is the heart beat of the nation and with its amazing taste holds the potential to ride the taste buds of the consumers at home and abroad. Although the green drink “Pakola Ice Cream Soda” is aynonyms with the name Pakola, but that’s not all, Pakola gives sensation by bottling other fruity flavors namely Pakola Orange, Pakola Lychee, Pakola Raspberry, Pakola Fresh Lime and Pakola Vino.
